1045740.name: Hit&Run VR baseball
1045740.description:
Hit & Run VR is a VR baseball game that you enjoy with VIVE.
3D graphics, hitting feel, through character A.I.
We have realized the best realism as playing a real baseball game.

[graphic]
With high resolution 3D graphics
The rich animations implemented through real baseball player motion capture make you experience the best possible reality in VR baseball games.

[Character A.I.]
The artificial intelligence of the character who plays the defense has been dramatically strengthened and the character artificial intelligence has been fully implemented. This allows a natural single play of up to 9 innings in 3 innings.

[Haptic]
The core of baseball is in the 'hitting feeling'.
Depending on your hitting, the bat responds to vibrations and you can feel the real bat feeling.
In addition to the controller dedicated to VIVE, you can also enjoy attaching a separate vibration device to the Bat.

[Network & 1: 1 Play]
1: 1 game over the network is also available. However, this version is not available.
1: 1 Network Play means that one player is a pitcher and the other player is a batter. Network play versions will be available in the future.

- Game mode information -

[Practice Play Mode]
You can practice hitting against artificial intelligence pitchers in an environment like reality. And you can see how well you hit through the distance the ball has been flying.

[Battle play mode]
When you select battle play mode, you can select Hitter mode or Pitcher mode.

[Select innings]
The player can choose one of the innings options: 1, 2 or 3 innings.

Press the trigger button on the controller and prepare to break the ball! Experience the best VR baseball games in the world and achieve your highest score!
This is a real baseball!
